title: Sir Ian McGeechan's combined England-New Zealand team: How many of Eddie Jones' men make the cut?
text:
England and New Zealand face each other in the first World Cup semi-final on Saturday, England coming off the back of a comfortable 40-16 victory over Australia in their quarter final and the All Blacks defeating Ireland by a similar margin.

If England are to make the final, they will need to beat a side that has not lost a game at the tournament since their 2007 quarter-final defeat to France.

There has been talk of espionage and England coach Eddie Jones said that pressure was "chasing the All Blacks down the street". New Zealand coach Steve Hansen naturally dismissed Jones' claims...
description: England and New Zealand face each other in the first World Cup semi-final on Saturday, England coming off the back of a comfortable 40-16 victory over Australia in their quarter final and the All Blacks defeating Ireland by a similar margin.
